original_title: A Whole New World (Bells In Hell)
overview: Sadia narrate how her father married her off to a man who treated her so cruelly. She tried to seek help from parents but her father sent her back to her husband. She later on got pregnant, gave birth to a still born and because of child birth complications she now suffers from fistula.
tagline: A girl gets married and gives birth to a stillborn
title: A Whole New World (Bells In Hell)
